name: gitbook_ops_add
description: You need to add a symlink called "ops_base" pointing to "src/ops/base" first. Will add all ops with a markdown file to the doc index (summary).

scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:prepare && npm run docs:api && gitbook build
scripts.docs:serve: npm run docs:prepare && npm run docs:api && gitbook serve --no-live

author: Tim Pulver
